fn.p: 2019 novel coronavirus (2019-nCoV); severe acute respiratory syndrome coronavirus 2 (SARS-COV-2); coronavirus disease 2019 (COVID-19); World Health Organization (WHO); RNA-dependent RNA synthetase (RdRp); Middle East respiratory syndrome (MERS); U.S. Food and Drug Administration (FDA).
